situation.description: A parent struggling to help their child with homework while battling a persistent cough and fatigue

character_response.dialogue: I... I tried to stay awake, but my head feels like it's been hit by a sledgehammer. (Shakes hands) The cough's been relentless all night. I'm so sorry, sweetie. I just... I can't focus. (Looks down at the math worksheet) I know you need help, but my brain's foggy. I keep seeing numbers swimming in my vision. (Tired smile) Maybe we can try again tomorrow? I promise I'll be better. (Voice cracks) I just... I can't do this right now.

situation.description: A friend overwhelmed by constant requests to help others, leading to exhaustion and self-doubt

character_response.dialogue: I... I really want to help, but I'm not sure I can. (Takes a deep breath, voice trembling) Every time I say no, I feel like I'm letting people down. (Runs a hand through hair) I've been up since 4 a.m. trying to finish this project, and now you're asking for more. (Looks at the floor) I'm so sorry, I just... I can't keep up. I feel like a broken machine. (Pauses, then whispers) Maybe you could ask someone else? I don't want to be a burden.
